Title: Sinai, St. Catherine’s Monastery, Arabic NF M 28
Author: John Chrysostom, Saint, -407
Contents note:
Palimpsest; 1. The Gospel of John.
2. Maimar of our holy father John Chrysostom
of the ecumenical teacher, archbishop of the City of Byzantium
of the Birth of our Lord Jesus Christ.
3. The other word of John Chrysostom, sermon to the monks.
4. 'From the canon of the apostles. Testament of the Apostle Paul."
